definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: R. P. Grimaldi, Discrete and Combinational Mathematics (5th edition), Pearson Education, 2004.
sentences.chinese: 戴顯權，基礎離散數學，旗標出版公司，2004。

sentences.english: The judgment of transitive binary relation is a difficult point in discrete mathematic.
sentences.chinese: 可傳遞二元關係的判定是離散數學中的一個難點。

sentences.english: The definition of main normal form in discrete mathematics is revised appropriately.
sentences.chinese: 對離散數學中主範式定義作了適當的修改。

sentences.english: I still have my discrete math textbook from college.
sentences.chinese: 我還保存着大學裏的離散數學課本。

sentences.english: Matroid theory is an important part of combinatorial mathematics and discrete mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 擬陣是組合數學和離散數學的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The math we use for modeling computational problems is, by and large, math on discrete integers.
sentences.chinese: 我們用來建立計算模型的，大體上是離散數學。
